Counting 1-10 in Korean. 1 = ha-na / 하나 (HAH-nah); 2 = dul / 둘 (dhool); 3 = set / 셋 (seht); 4 = net / 넷 (neht); 5 = da-sul / 다섯 (DA-suht); 6 = yuh-seot / 여섯 ...
